sentences.english: Diagnosis and confirmation of plague requires laboratory testing.
sentences.chinese: 鼠疫的診斷和確認需要實驗室檢測。

sentences.english: Pneumonic form of plague is the most virulent and least common form of plague.
sentences.chinese: 肺鼠疫是鼠疫的最致命和極少見的類型。

sentences.english: Pneumonic form of plague is the most virulent and least common form of plague.
sentences.chinese: 肺鼠疫是鼠疫的最致命和極少見的類型。

sentences.english: Herb field mouse (Apodemus uralensis) was removed from plague hosts.
sentences.chinese: 排除了小林姬鼠作爲鼠疫宿主的可能。

sentences.english: Objective Studding the model for forecast of plague epizootic of Citelas Dauricus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究吉林西北部草原達烏爾黃鼠鼠疫預報模型。

sentences.english: Yersinia pestis phage lysis test was an important method on differentiation between Yersinia pestis and Yersinia pseudotuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 鼠疫噬菌體是鑑別鼠疫菌和假結核菌的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: Yersinia pestis phage lysis test was an important method on differentiation between Yersinia pestis and Yersinia pseudotuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 鼠疫噬菌體是鑑別鼠疫菌和假結核菌的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: By looking at genetic variations in living strains of Yersinia pestis, Dr. Achtman’s team has reconstructed a family tree of the bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 通過對基因變化的研究，他們重建了鼠疫細菌的家譜。

sentences.english: As a result of the plague, much land was left untended and there was a terrible shortage of labour.
sentences.chinese: 鼠疫導致了大片土地無人照管和勞動力極度匱乏。

sentences.english: But there are not treatises on pathogeny and pathogenesis of plague.
sentences.chinese: 然而，對鼠疫病因病機的研究和介紹缺如。

sentences.english: To observe the trends of plague FI antibody in serums of Microtus fuscus.
sentences.chinese: 觀察青海田鼠血清中鼠疫FI抗體動態。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the sensitivity of Yersinia pestis along Qinghai-Tibet Railway.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了解青藏鐵路沿線鼠疫菌對抗生素的敏感性。

sentences.english: More commonly advanced stages of bubonic plague will result in the presence of Y. pestis in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 較常見的晚期腺鼠疫將造成血液中存在鼠疫桿菌。

sentences.english: More commonly advanced stages of bubonic plague will result in the presence of Y. pestis in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 較常見的晚期腺鼠疫將造成血液中存在鼠疫桿菌。

sentences.english: The plague is fairly easy to suppress with antibiotics and pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 用抗生素和殺蟲劑就能相當容易地控制鼠疫。
